quotes.quote: A person who has power has an open mind. Their mind is open and they can see on other levels. Seeing is a quality that comes to a person who has personal power.
An open mind isn't the same thing as an empty head.
You have to be very nimble and very open minded. Your success is going to be very dependent on how your adapt.
Open up your heart and mind to the infinite wonderful experiences there are in life.
Mind has door. A password can open it. That word is stored safely in your heart, waiting for your willingness to retrieve it.
With an open mind, you are the imagination of universal consciousness and the creation of the subconscious mind that wanders throughout the universe.
Until the mind is open, the heart stays closed. The open mind is the key to the open heart.
A fully open mind could shatter the skull in both directions.
Keep an open mind and be ready to change and adapt to the situation. Don't ask reality to conform to your blueprint, but transform your blueprint to adapt to reality.
An open mind is all very well in its way, but it ought not to be so open that there is no keeping anything in or out of it.
Keeping your mind open in the face of uncertainty is the single most powerful secret of unleashing your creative potential.
It's essential to keep an open mind, and to be willing better yet, eager to try new things.
When you open your mind, you open new doors to new possibilities for yourself and new opportunities to help others.
As soon as you open your mind to doing things differently, the doors of opportunity practically fly off their hinges.
The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
Accept all that is given to you with an open mind. Every gift, whether it warmed your spirit or brought disappointment is a blessing.
An open mind is like an open window. It lets the fresh air in.
Keep a very open mind, keep a very open heart of what you are to face. You will be entering paradise. You will be entering the happiest life, everlasting life.
You have to keep your mind as wide-open as your eyes, because almost nothing is what it seems.
A truly open mind means forcing our imaginations to conform to the evidence of reality, and not vice versa.
Open your mind to the infinite possibilities that exist for you; then create within your reality the things that you desire.
If you keep an open mind, you can learn so much from the people around you.
By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
Keep your heart open for love; and your mind open for innovative ideas.
Maintaining an open mind is essential when exploring the unknown, but allowing one's brains to fall out in the process is inadvisable.
Open your mind before you open your mouth.
Where there is an open mind, there will always be a frontier.
An open mind, is the best weapon, in the fight between light and darkness.
Open-mindedness is a precondition for generating new ideas, but focusing on the problem is almost equally important.
The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
